product_name: Laura MercierTinted Moisturizer Oil Free Blurred Matte SPF 30
summary: SummaryLaura Mercier's Tinted Moisturizer Oil Free Blurred Matte SPF 30 bestselling tinted moisturizer in a new & improved weightless formula that provides 24HR+ shine control, blurs skin, and reduces appearance of pores while hydrating for 16HRs.
details: DetailsFeatures24HR+ shine controlBlurs skin and reduces appearance of pores16HR hydrationSPF 30 protectionInstantly controls oilBlurs the look of pores from day 1Supports skin barrier functionOil Free. Non-Comedogenic. Non-Acnegenic. Dermatologist Tested.Key IngredientsWhite Rose Wine Complex: Balance’s sebum production immediately and overtimeEjitsu Rose: Reduces appearance of pores over timeFrench Rock Samphire Extract: Refines skin tone and texturePlant Derived Cellulose Powders & French Kaolin: Mattifies, soothes, and blurs skinResearch Results24HR+ Shine Control and Blurring: Clinically proven to control shine and blur the look of pores for over 24 hours.**16HR Skin-Balancing Hydration: Provides 16 hour hydration to help balance skin.**Supports Skin Barrier Function: Clinically proven to support skin’s barrier function.**Breathable Wear: 91% agree the product feels breathable immediately.*Non-Cakey: 88% agree this product does not look cakey immediately after application.**Consumer study of 30 panelists at independent laboratory**Clinical study of 30 panelists at independent laboratoryItem 2636259How To UseHOW TO APPLY:Dispense Tinted Moisturizer on the back of your hand and use it as a palette.Picking up a small amount from back of the hand, apply with fingers, smoothing over face in a downward motion to ensure facial hairs lay flat.Laura recommends starting at the outer portion of the face and working inwards toward the nose, avoiding excess application around the contours of the face.Pat on additional product to build coverage where needed.Laura's finishing touch, inspired by a Parisian facial technique, is to smooth the remaining product under the jawline, neck, and chin.PRO TIPS:To build more coverage, pick up product on the back of hand using a foundation brush and work Tinted Moisturizer into the bristles on a clean area on back of the hand. Stipple onto any areas that need additional coverage.If a fuller coverage is desired, mix a few drops of foundation into Tinted Moisturizer to get more pigment.IngredientsActive Ingredients: Titanium Dioxide (2.9%); Zinc Oxide (6.1%). Inactive Ingredients: Water (Aqua/Eau), Propanediol, Silica, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Undecane, Polyglyceryl-10 Decaisostearate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Glycerin, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Powder, Tridecane, Sodium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Jojoba Esters, Butylene Glycol, Triethyl Citrate, Stearic Acid, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylyl Glycol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Stearoyl Glutamic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Vp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Propylene Carbonate, Benzoic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Rosa Multiflora Fruit Extract, Crithmum Maritimum Extract, Illite, Kaolin, Tocopherol, Rosa Damascena Extract, Wine Extract, Sucrose, 1,2-Hexanediol, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract. +/- (May Contain/Peut Contenir) Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: HOW TO APPLY:Dispense Tinted Moisturizer on the back of your hand and use it as a palette.Picking up a small amount from back of the hand, apply with fingers, smoothing over face in a downward motion to ensure facial hairs lay flat.Laura recommends starting at the outer portion of the face and working inwards toward the nose, avoiding excess application around the contours of the face.Pat on additional product to build coverage where needed.Laura's finishing touch, inspired by a Parisian facial technique, is to smooth the remaining product under the jawline, neck, and chin.PRO TIPS:To build more coverage, pick up product on the back of hand using a foundation brush and work Tinted Moisturizer into the bristles on a clean area on back of the hand. Stipple onto any areas that need additional coverage.If a fuller coverage is desired, mix a few drops of foundation into Tinted Moisturizer to get more pigment.

reviews.headline: New formula is not good.
reviews.comments: I've used this product for 10+ years- it was lightweight but nice coverage, with SPF and natural looking. New formula is thicker/heavier and the tint is off. 2N Nude has been replaced with Maple. Maple is orangey. Nothing like it used to be.

reviews.headline: Product Separated After Return Window
reviews.comments: This product worked great for the first 3 months after opening. It was stored indoors in my bathroom drawer with all of my other makeup. The expiration date says December 2026, but yesterday I noticed it had separated and couldn't be used anymore.

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it
reviews.comments: Ive heard such great things about this product, but unfortunately my acne flared up in various areas of my face after starting to us this product, and when I stopped, the acne went away.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I liked the coverage this product provides.  Moisturizer and SPF sunscreen are a big plus.

reviews.headline: Too heavy!  Being back the old formula!
reviews.comments: Too heavy!  I need a lightweight tinted moisturizer not heavy makeup!  Please bring back the old formula.  I have to find a new tinted moisturizer.

reviews.headline: My new holy grail for summer skin!
reviews.comments: The perfect matte tinted moisturizer! It keeps my oily skin shine-free all day, feels lightweight, and blurs pores for a smooth, natural finish. Love the SPF 30 for everyday wear. My new go-to for the summer!

reviews.headline: Perfect lightweight for Summer!
reviews.comments: I love how lightweight and easy to use it is. The covegage is light to medium amd it helped ti civer my redness and imperfections. Its also great because it has SPF which makes it perfect for  summer! Oefect fhrcouly or combo skin since it has a matte finish.

reviews.headline: Lightweight, Matte, and Just the Right Tint
reviews.comments: This tinted moisturizer is perfect for everyday wear, it evens out my skin tone without feeling heavy. The shade Birch blends really well and I love that it keeps me matte without drying me out.

reviews.headline: too thick to use as sunscreen
reviews.comments: I purchased the Laura Mercier Tinted Moisturizer Blurred Matte, SPF 30, with the intention of using it as a tinted sunscreen.  I applied the necessary amount, 1/4 teaspoon, to my face and neck.  Thats right, in order to get SPF 30 protection, you need to apply 1/4 teaspoon to face andneck.  Well, this did not look good in that amount.  It looked really thick and cakey, like I was giving myself a facial.  I will return this.  I'm giving this 3 stars, though, because I think this might work well if you don't use it as sunscreen and, instead, use it as lightweight foundation, with just a sheer to light layer to get a bit of coverage.  It is definitely a matte finish, which I like because I get oily throughout the day.

reviews.headline: A Beautiful Radiant Finish
reviews.comments: I'm  not the heavy foundation type so I love that Laura Mercier has now improved their Tinted Moisturer Blurr Matte! I tend to have oily skin in my T-Zone area but this has shine control for 24hrs which I love! It has a blurring effect to camouflage enlarge pores! It's light yet buildable. It provides the right amount of hydration and protects your skin from the harmful UV rays with a SPF of 30! French Rose Clay, Eijitsu Rose Extract, and White Rose Extract were infused in this tint to help balance oil production, decrease pores, and smooth skin.  I was sent the colors Cedar, Ochre, and Clay! When, I tell all three of these colors work for me I mean it. It's hard for a person of color at times to find shades that matches our skintone perfectly and I'm glad that Laura Mercier took the time to actually create colors that we can actually use and look natural!

reviews.headline: Finally Found Shade To Match Previous Formula!
reviews.comments: I used 2N1 in the previous formulation, and 1N Birch is the closest match in the oil free tinted moisturizer. The "dewy" tinted moisturizer feels tacky, as if you're mixing drugstore brand sunblock with foundation. Hate it. The "oil free blurred matte" will do, though I preferred the previous formulation. Don't believe the recommended shade of 2N Maple you previously used 2N1, because the maple shade does NOT match. It's yellow tinged!

reviews.headline: No bueno, bring back old formula
reviews.comments: The formula is not the same as their tried and true oil free tinted moisturizer. This new blurred matte is a no go for me and i love Laura Mercier and have been using their oil free tinted moisturizer for iver 5 years and when i went to replenish this is the new one that has replaced it. Super sad and disappointed, goes on smooth but separates.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: This is the PERFECT base product for anyone looking for lightweight, matte coverage this summer. I absolutely love this tinted moisturizer. It has a lovely formula that looks amazing on my skin. It truly is natte and stays in place all day (even out in the sun). It has light coverage but still enough to cover redness and blemishes.

reviews.headline: New formula SUCKS
reviews.comments: The new formula is trash! It settles into my pores and looks cakey. Its also VERY heavy and the old formula used to just glide right on. I would get oilier with the old formula, but would just blot halfway through the day and it would look good still. Now it looks bad an hour in and shows any dry patch I have. Very disapointed.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I've been using this Tinted Moisturizer Blurred Matte SPF 30 and I'm honestly impressed. It gives a really natural, soft matte finish like your skin but smoother. It blurs my pores, evens out tone, and keeps shine under control without drying me out. Super lightweight and comfy, plus it has SPF 30 which is a nice bonus. Perfect for everyday wear if you like that low effort polished look.

reviews.headline: everyday go to
reviews.comments: I'm using the shade 4c Hazel. My skin tone is medium to tan. This shade is the perfect match for me. I use it 3/4 days a week. It is very light weight but has a great coverage. It also gives protection from sun. The coverage is matte. It instantly covers the pores and hyperpigmentation. I set with a loose powder. And follow the usual routine of blush, liner etc.

reviews.headline: The best!!
reviews.comments: I am so picky and have tried so many foundations and tints … this one is the best especially for oily skin in summer with sweat! For sure  my fav

reviews.headline: Color chart is inaccurate
reviews.comments: Aftef reading through reviews I was unsure about ordering between the color that I thought would be my correct color or ordering 1 shade lighter. I ended up just going into the store to test them myself. The color chart is wayyyy off. Based on the chart I should be a 4N, I'm always some variation of a medium/tan neutral in every brand. I had to get 2 shades lighter in this, 2N. So glad I went in instead of ordering online. Once you find your shade the formula is good.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I'm obsessed with this! It's the perfect amount of coverage for me. It isn't full coverage. It does cover any hyperpigmentation I have tho which is enough coverage for me. It feels nice on the skin and not sticky at all. And it lasts all day!

reviews.headline: I would not recommend
reviews.comments: I was looking for a tinted moisturizer for summer that didn't feel heavy. This isn't it it feels heavy and doesn't give a natural look.

media.headline: My honest review
media.caption: On my skin after I applied it

faceoff_positive.comments:
This product is such a nice formula, all across the board! The product smoothes over skin like a creamy dream and the tint evenly distributes and dries down without streaks.

It also is lovely in that if you don't get the exact correct shade, it blends out to create a nice tint that you can control and soften, blend over or under other products, and doesn't seem to pill or react with cream, water-based, powder, or oil-based products. 

I love love love that it is fragrance-free and non-irritating, and it seems gentle with sensitive skin and for those of us who are chemically sensitive. 

I love the way it looks on the skin too, as it claims to blur and make texture and pores less visible. This is a lovely feature for my 50-year-old skin.  It also has a nice hydrating but matte finish. 

The tube is generous in size also, which means that it will last and can be used across various body parts.
I received mine and it was slightly darker than my skin tone, which I was worried about initially, but wow does it provide a nice sunkissed skin tint and base for my other products, and it looks great across my shoulders, chest, hands, decolletage, and legs and feet. It helps my skin look healthy and unified, correcting imperfections. It seems pretty transfer proof too, but I haven't yet tested it after sweating or in hot summer weather. 

Overall, I am really pleased with this product and love that it can be versatile even if the color isn't an exact match. I am considering purchasing a lighter shade to support my winter complexion. This product has me thinking differently, using this as a base and contour and filling in lighter shades with my foundation and concealer. I mention this to encourage you to try it and play!

For reference, I have a light-medium skin tone and am using 4N (Teak)  which is a shade or two too dark for me, but offers a great sun-kissed summer tint. I received this product as an incentive and this review is authentic and honest.
faceoff_positive.headline: Fantastic, Fragrance-Free & Smoothing for Mature Skin!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was excited to try this product because I wanted something that would provide hydration along with light coverage. However, I found that it didn't feel like a moisturizer at all. Instead, it had a very matte finish and felt more like a lightweight foundation rather than a hydrating tinted moisturizer. If you're expecting a dewy or moisturizing effect, this might not be the best option.

That being said, there are some positives. The color matching was excellent—it blended seamlessly with my skin tone. It's also very lightweight and comfortable to wear. I appreciate that it includes SPF, which is great for days when I want a matte finish with sun protection without layering too many products.

Would I buy it? Probably not, since I live in a very dry climate and need something with more hydration. However, I think it could work well for someone with oilier skin, living in humid places, or someone looking for a matte, natural-looking tint rather than a moisturizing effect.

Would I recommend it? It depends on what you're looking for. If you want a tinted moisturizer that actually hydrates, this may not be the best option. But if you're looking for a lightweight, matte product with good color adaptation and some sun protection, it could be a great choice!

I got the product for free in exchange of this written review.
faceoff_negative.headline: Lightweight with Great Color Match, But Lacks Hydration
